content.p: This tab enables you to upload a background image for the Insight Display User Note screen.

Local File—Enter a valid file path to a 320px by 240px Windows® bitmap to use as a background image on the Insight Display or click Browse to locate a background image file on your local system. Click Apply and the image will install on the Active Onboard Administrator and the Standby Onboard Administrator (if present) after a successful upload.
Click Default to restore the original User Note background image.
Click View User Note to display the current User Note screen.
